Unique Items.name: alien statue
Unique Items.description: Movement: Exhaust and spend 2 movemtn pints and 1 Sanity to roll a die. If the die is a success, draw 1 Spell or gain 3 Clue tokens. If it is a failure, lose 2 Stamina.

Unique Items.name: ancient tablet
Unique Items.description: Movement: Spend 3 movement points and discard Ancient Tablet to roll 2 dice. For every success rolled, draw 1 Spell. For every failure rolled, gain 2 Clue tokens.

Unique Items.name: blue watcher of the pyramid
Unique Items.description: Any Phase: Lose 2 Stamina and discard Blue Watcher of the Pyramid to automatically succed at a Combat check or a Fight or Lore check made to close a gate. This cannot be used against an Ancient One.

Unique Items.name: book of dzyan
Unique Items.description: Movement: Exhaust and spend 2 movement points to make a Lore (-1) check. if you pass, draw 1 Spell, lose 1 Sanity, and put 1 Stamina token from the bank on Book of Dzyan. If there are 2 Stamina tokens on it, discard book of Dzyan. If you fail, nothing happens.

Unique Items.name: cabala of saboth
Unique Items.description: Movement: Exhaust and spend 2 movement points to make Lore (-2) check. If you pass, draw 1 Skill and discard Cabala of Saboth. If you fail, nothing happens.

Unique Items.name: cultes des goules
Unique Items.description: Movement: Exhaust and spend 2 movement points to make a Lore (-2) check. If you pass, draw 1 Spell and gain 1 Clue token, but lose 2 Sanity and discard Cultes des Goules. If you fail, nothing happens.

Unique Items.name: dragon's eye
Unique Items.description: Any Phase: Exhaust and lose 1 Sanity after drawing a gate or location card to draw a new card in its place.

Unique Items.name: elder sign
Unique Items.description: Arkham Encounter Phase: When closing a gate, lose 1 Stamina and 1 Sanity and return this card to the box. you do not need to make a skill check or spend any Clue tokens to seal the gate. In addition, remove one doom token from the Ancient One's doom track.

Unique Items.name: enchanted blade
Unique Items.description: +4 to Combat checks.

Unique Items.name: enchanted jewerly
Unique Items.description: Any Phase: Put 1 Stamina token from the bank on Enchanted Jewelry to avoid losing 1 Stamina. If there are 3 Stamina tokens on it, discard Enchanted Jewelry.

Unique Items.name: enchanted knife
Unique Items.description: +3 to Combat checks.

Unique Items.name: flute of the outer gods
Unique Items.description: Any Phase: Lose 3 Sanity and 3 Stamina and discard Flute of the outer Gods before making a Combat check to defeat all monsters in your current area. This does not affect Ancient Ones.

Unique Items.name: gate box
Unique Items.description: Any Phase: When you return to Arkham from an Other World, you can return to any location with an open gate, not just those leading to the Other World you were in.

Unique Items.name: healing stone
Unique Items.description:
Upkeep: Exhaust to gain 1 Stamina or 1 Sanity.
Discard this card if the Ancient One awakens.

Unique Items.name: holy water
Unique Items.description:
+6 to Combat checks.
(Discard after use).

Unique Items.name: lamp of alhazred
Unique Items.description: +5 to Combat checks.

Unique Items.name: nameless cults
Unique Items.description: Movement: Exhaust and spend 1 movement point to make a Lore (-1) check. If you pass, draw 1 Spell, lose 1 Sanity, and discard Nameless Cults. If you fail, nothing happens.

Unique Items.name: necronomicon
Unique Items.description: Movement: Exhaust and spend 2 movement points to make a Lore (-2) check. If you pass, draw 1 Spell and lose 2 Sanity. If you fail, nothing happens.

Unique Items.name: obsidian statue
Unique Items.description: Any Phase: Discard Obsidian Statue to cancel all Stamina or Sanity loss being dealt to you from one source.

Unique Items.name: pallid mask
Unique Items.description: +2 to Evade checks.

Unique Items.name: powder of ibn-ghazi
Unique Items.description:
+9 to Combat checks.
(Lose 1 Sanity and discard after use).

Unique Items.name: ruby of r'lyeh
Unique Items.description: Movement: You get 3 extra movement points.

Unique Items.name: silver key
Unique Items.description: Any Phase: Put 1 Stamina token from the bank on Silver Key before making an Evade check to automatically pass it. Discard Silver Key after using it if there are 3 Stamina tokens on it.

Unique Items.name: sword of glory
Unique Items.description: +6 to Combat checks.

Unique Items.name: the king in yellow
Unique Items.description: Movement: Exhaust and spend 2 movement points to make a Lore (-2) check. If you pass, gain 4 Clue tokens, lose 1 Sanity and discard The King in Yellow. If you fail, nothing happens.

Unique Items.name: warding statue
Unique Items.description: Any Phase: Discard Warding Statue after failing a Combat check
